opengraph.title: Hidden History of Polio Vaccine
opengraph.description: by Tom Valentine (Tom Valentine is a veteran health commentator. This is an excerpt from an 1996 article sent to me by Tony Blizzard.) The story of the lessening of specific diseases is not cut and dry at all; there are variables and multiple factors--not merely vaccinations--to take into account
